name: react-editorjs-renderer
description: React Editor.js Renderer, based on API and Open Source
author: antoineaudrain

scripts.link: cd src/ && npm run build && npm link
scripts.link:react: npm run link && cd example/react/ && npm i && npm link react-editorjs-renderer
scripts.link:next: npm run link && cd example/next/ && npm i && npm link react-editorjs-renderer
scripts.example:react: npm run link:react && cd example/react/ && run build && npm start
scripts.example:next: npm run link:next && cd example/next/ && npm run build && npm start
